translations: 使松开；取消；破坏（undo 的过去式）

sentences.sentence: I undid the package and took out the books.
He undid most of the good work of the previous manager.
sentences.translation: 他把前任经理的大部分功绩都毁掉了。

sentences.sentence: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentences.translation: 我解开了我黄灰色相间衬衫最下面的两个钮扣。
